name: Communist Orcrising
description:
Long ago, the dark lord fell in battle. Fueled by centuries of hatred, the elves enslaved the orcs.

Now, there is a new dark lord on the rise - COMMUNISM!

Join together with your green-skinned comrades to topple the pointy-eared bourgeoise.

Convert your fellow orcs. Turn the military against their masters. Free the proletariat!

Programming by Tobias Oehme

Graphics by Luiz Aguzzi
